Phenomenal_Luck.help: Boosts your Defense to all attacks by 33% for 60 seconds.
Phenomenal_Luck.targetHelp: Boosts your Defense to all attacks by 33% for 60 seconds.
Phenomenal_Luck.attackerHit: You now have {PowerName} and greatly increase your Defense.

Robust.help: Increases all your Damage Resistance by 20% for 60 seconds. Robust also protects you from enemy Teleportation.
Robust.attackerHit: You are Robust and take a lot less damage from attacks and can resist enemy Teleportation.

Uncanny_Insight.help: Makes your attacks 37.5% more accurate and increases your Perception by 50% for 60 seconds.
Uncanny_Insight.targetHelp: Makes your attacks 37.5% more accurate and increases your Perception by 50% for 60 seconds.
Uncanny_Insight.attackerHit: You have {PowerName} into your enemies' weakness and greatly increase your chance To Hit and your Perception.

Second_Wind.attackerHit: You get your {PowerName}, and gain a lot of Endurance.

Resurgence.attackerHit: You undergo a {PowerName} and gain a lot of Hit Points

Righteous_Rage.help: Increases all your damage by 50% for 60 seconds.
Righteous_Rage.attackerHit: You are filled with {PowerName} and strike with a lot more damage.

Iron_Will.help: Greatly boosts your resistance to Immobilization, Sleep, Disorient and Hold effects for 240 seconds. Must be used before you are Slept, Held or Disoriented, but can be used after being Immobilized.
Iron_Will.targetHelp: Greatly boosts your resistance to Immobilization, Sleep, Disorient and Hold effects for 240 seconds. Must be used before you are Slept, Held or Disoriented, but can be used after being Immobilized.
Iron_Will.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} protects you from Immobilization, Sleep, Disorient, and Hold effects.

Escape.help: Frees you from many Sleep, Hold, Immobilization, Disorient, Fear, Confuse and KnockBack effects and boosts your resistance to Repel, Taunt and Placate effects for 90 seconds. This Inspiration can be used even while under such effects.
Escape.targetHelp: Frees you from many Sleep, Hold, Immobilization, Disorient, Fear, Confuse and KnockBack effects and boosts your resistance to Repel, Taunt and Placate effects for 90 seconds. This Inspiration can be used even while under such effects.
Escape.attackerHit: You are now able to Escape from most effects.

Restoration.help: If you are defeated, you can wake up with 3/4 of your hit points. You will, however, have no Endurance, and unable to recover Endurance for 10 seconds. Unlike weaker inspirations, Restoration will not leave you Disoriented, and you will be protected from XP Debt for 20 seconds.
Restoration.targetHelp: You have been Restored. You cannot recovery Endurance for a while, but you are protected from XP Debt for 20 seconds.
Restoration.attackerHit: Your miraculous {PowerName} saves you from the brink of death. You feel a little weak and cannot do anything for a short while.
